comments.body: If this pkg runs on Python 2 and 3, you can use `noarch: python`: https://conda.io/docs/user-guide/tasks/build-packages/define-metadata.html#architecture-independent-packages

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +10,14 @@  sha256: 43d623edae6f16db038d29f8586406002f2bea63c0363dc9acbedac27de7040e

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps -vv"
